attributes.review: literally the worst app ever. i wanted to try to stay updated on politics and let me tell you this is not the place to go. fake news, bad people, and slowest app out there. tiktok is better💫🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: NOT EVEN CLOSE TO WORTH IT

attributes.review: I was thriving before I downloaded this app as a god-fearing trump supporting right-winger, hoping to support our president through his campaign and make America great again. As soon as I downloaded the app, everything went wrong. My wife left me and I can’t keep up with the child support, my dog was struck by lighting, and every time I open the app something in my house catches fire. My neighbors avoid me like the plague and everyone runs inside of their houses whenever I go outside. My kids cry every time they see me, and I’ve been banned from every library and hospital in the US. I even went to my sister’s house to talk about everything, but the moment I entered her home our father went into sudden cardiac arrest. All of the grass in my backyard has wilted and there was a sudden uprising of angry raccoons that won’t stop clawing at my door until I close the app. I’ve been in a constant downward spiral and soon I may have to declare bankruptcy. I fear that god may strike me down the next time I leave my house if I don’t delete it. I’m afraid. I don’t know what to do other than delete it and warn everyone else considering downloading this app - don’t. It’s not worth it. Things will go wrong.
attributes.title: Everything in Shambles

attributes.review: It’s like the worst app ever, took so long to download, also it’s lagging never again🤢🤢

This app is trash. When I first got it my pet toothpick (who was sitting right next to me) immediately went missing. I spent 20 minutes trying to find him but he was nowhere to be found. Then I was shown a cheeto and it stole my pretzel. So I left the app and went to get a glass of water. When I came back to the app with my water it spilled all over me and the same cheeto that stole my pretzel said I didn’t deserve water. On top of that an alligator came out of a volcano into my room and stole my yoshi.
attributes.title: Absolutely Not
